[齐]
Rare and unorthodox variant of 齊 , found in informal writing during the Ming and Qing dynasties period. This character is not a further simplification of 斉 .
Unrelated to 喬 > 乔 and to the Kangxi radicals 儿 and 文 .

[齊]
Ideogram ( 指事 ): a field of grain, hence of uniform height. Compare 森 , in which three trees represent a whole forest.
